name: Felix The Toy 0.0.3
description:
0.0.1 - 11/8/19 - Launch

0.0.2 11/8/19 - Fixed Physics and Camera Angle

0.0.3 11/9/19 - Added Quality Options

Felix the toy is a 3D Platformer with a interesting setting.

The world is huge and you are but a small toy.

The game has full arrow and WASD keyboard support.

Also included is the Xpadder program, which allows you to use gamepad mapped with the standard keyboard controls.

Default Keyboard controls -

1. WASD/Arrow keys to move

2. Space to Jump

3. G to pickup objects (future updates)

4. Escape to Pause

5. Left Mouse Button to Confirm

XPADDER Mapping Tip -

1. WASD/Arrows to left analog stick

2. Space to A or X on Playstation or xbox controller

3. Escape to start button

If you would like to make a donation to this project use this link -
